Articles.Content:
O|Post only Stock ships, but they must be cool/original. Post like this.....

Name:

Image:

Description:

Here\'s mine.....

Name: K2

Image:

Description: A large 4 engine canted-thrust lander for anywhere!
Not to sound like a dick, but what\'s original/revolutionary about this design? Looks like a pretty standard combination of parts in a pretty standard configuration to me.
Could you tone down the title please?

Sorry, I will....

I like it because it is big and looks cool. Ill post something better later....

Is it a VTOL?

In a literal sense of the term, yes. The landing gear and lack of gear bays tells me it takes off and lands (maybe) vertically on it\'s struts. Question is, can it fly straight like a plane after it takes off or is it made to go to the mun?

Yes, it goes to the moon, minmus, anywhere!

Heres my Forever glider, also looks pretty cool.

Those engines look like they would tear the wings right off at the angle their at.. i have a cool little project i made. It\'s all stock, except for those orange nose caps, but i\'d like to show it off anyway. Those four huge rockets on the wings are just the launcher to get it up halfway out of the atmosphere.
I did try it. It does fly great, contrary to the looks of it. Not enough fuel for the moon and back, but it still flies great.
Try turning off the engine and puling up, it flies without fuel!
